mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sab_questions (questionNum, memberNum, title, content) VALUES (sab_questions_SEQ.nextval, #{memberNum}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT q.questionNum as questionNum, q.title as title, q.content as content, q.indate as indate, q.views as views, m.id as memberName FROM sab_questions q, sab_members m WHERE q.memberNum = m.memberNum ORDER BY q.indate DESC

SELECT q.questionNum as questionNum, q.title as title, q.content as content, q.indate as indate, q.views as views, m.id as memberName FROM sab_questions q, sab_members m WHERE q.memberNum = m.memberNum AND q.questionNum = #{value} ORDER BY q.indate DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sab_questions SET views = views + 1 WHERE questionNum = #{value}
